# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

# Terraform Compliance with NIST

## Objective
Align Terraform infrastructure with NIST 800-53 compliance controls.

## Recommendations
- Enable logging and encryption on all resources.
- Enforce IAM policies and audit trails.
- Use VPC flow logs and CloudTrail for traceability.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_cloudtrail" "secure_trail" {
  name                          = "secure-cloudtrail"
  s3_bucket_name                = aws_s3_bucket.trail_logs.bucket
  include_global_service_events = true
  is_multi_region_trail         = true
  enable_log_file_validation    = true
}

resource "aws_s3_bucket" "trail_logs" {
  bucket = "compliance-logs"
  acl    = "private"
  server_side_encryption_configuration {
    rule {
      apply_server_side_encryption_by_default {
        sse_algorithm = "AES256"
      }
    }
  }
}
```
